mapper.update: update cookie c set c.delay_timeout_time = date_add( current_timestamp, interval (select cookie_delay_timeout from site where id= (select site_id from site_account where id=c.id) ) minute ) where c.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from cookie c join site_account sa on c.site_account_id = sa.id join site s on sa.site_id = s.id where s.id = #{siteId} -- enabled and c.enable_status = 1 and s.enable_status = 1 and sa.enable_status = 1 -- max concurrency and sa.current_use_count < s.account_max_use_count -- delay and (s.account_delay_timeout = -1 or sa.delay_timeout_time < current_timestamp) -- if blocked and sa.block_current_count < s.account_max_block_count and sa.block_timeout_time < current_timestamp -- max concurrency and c.current_use_count < s.cookie_max_use_count -- block and c.current_block_count < s.cookie_max_block_count -- delay and (s.cookie_delay_timeout = -1 or c.delay_timeout_time < current_timestamp) -- expired check and c.expire_time > current_timestamp order by sa.current_use_count , c.current_use_count limit 1,1

update cookie c set enbale_status = 0 where c.expire_time < current_timestamp or c.current_block_count > ( select cookie_max_block_count from site s where s.id = (select site_id from site_account sa where sa.id =c.id) )
